lender.name: James Allman-Gulino
lender.loan_because: I want to help innovative entrepreneurs in places of the world that can't get capital easily.
lender.occupational_info: I will be in Uganda from May to November 2010 completing a Kiva Fellowship. I will be working with MCDT SACCO, Pearl Microfinance, and BRAC Uganda, so please check out their Field Partner pages!

lender.name: Tom Z
lender.loan_because: I am struck by the determination and hard work expressed in the people and their businesses showcased on Kiva. I believe micro-financing is the only way that these folks will ever get a break and hopefully realize their hopes and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help people invest their money.

lender.name: Peenesh Shah
lender.loan_because: we should.

lender.name: Arlene
lender.loan_because: ...to let go of what I don't really need, and give it to people who do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and do research at a university in the Boston area.

lender.name: Allahna
lender.loan_because: To help her so she may have a better furture
lender.occupational_info: I\'m a student in the 3rd grade.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I have traveled to Laos and Cambodia, and I have seen people with almost nothing because they have limited resources and opportunites. I got this as a Christmas gift, but I want to help give people in developing countries opportunities for success.
lender.occupational_info: I do research studies on alcoholism and HIV for a university.

lender.name: Aaron, Casey & Riley
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to have access to loans in order to start my businesses. I'd like to give others the same opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I own two restaurants and I am a principal manager for a small environmentally friendly forest products company. I am a single father with two wonderful daughters who are 9 and 10 years old. I love to travel and have traveled with my daughters in order to teach them an appreciation for different parts of the world, different cultures and the fact that there are wonderful people all over the world. I am involving them in our Kiva loans so they can build an appreciation for helping others.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I believe the best way to gain peace in the world is to help provide a path toward a good life for everyone willing to work for it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professor at a university and I am also a beekeeper.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I want to treat others like I would want to be treated if I was in the same situation.
lender.occupational_info: My company delivers wireless internet to emerging markets. Our mission is to bridge the digital divide to improve the world we live in by making it smaller

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: Sometimes people don't need a hand-out, they just need a leg up.
lender.occupational_info: I help my business plan for disasters and other interuptions so that we can protect our employees and assets, and continue being profitable.

lender.name: Caro
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Glaeser
lender.loan_because: I want to.
lender.occupational_info: Ridiculously time consuming.

lender.name: Sarah & Jim
lender.occupation: Jim is a carpenter & Sarah is a physical therapist
lender.loan_because: I would like to help entrepeneurs strive to make a better life for their families and their community.
lender.occupational_info: Jim - shipping & handling\Sarah - help children with physical disabilties be able to participate in school

lender.name: Janice/John
lender.loan_because: My family and I think that we are very fortunate.We like the idea of giving people a chance to succeed with a little help. We wish more people could reach inside themselves and help others.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a nurse for over 38 years. I am a school nurse .I love my students and my job ! I am married with 2 children ages 24and 12

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I'm so happy that I can directly impact someone else's life in such a positive way.
lender.occupational_info: I am in charge of a large group of workers who make fun games that people play on computers.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I was first introduced to Kiva by my aunt (the woman on my right in the picture). She gave lending gift certificates to my two brothers and myself for Christmas 2006. I took a great interest in the program and cashed all of our gift certificates in to start lending. After I got going, I realized what a wonderful program this is.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time grad student at Central Michigan University

lender.name: Jed
lender.loan_because: My stepfather, Jim Stevenson asked me and my wife to donate to someone through kiva.org as a Christmas present to him, My wife, Megan aand I are community oriented and would like to think we are able to make some differnce for the underadvantaged in the world. Luckily for us my stepfather had asked us to do this as a gift to him, otherwise I do not think we would have been involved with micro lending at this time. And thanks to Jim for starting the process, Megan and I have been able to spread the word to friends who want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a social worker in a child welfare office ensuring the safety of children in my community and working to improve the quality of life for families. \r\nMy wife, Megan works as a transfer and graduation counselor with a state university.

lender.name: Jim & Maureen
lender.loan_because: This is our personal foreign policy. And it is working.
lender.occupational_info: We create databases, websites and maps for small oil and gas companies. We have been working for the Jicarila Apache Nation lately. www.jicarillaoga.com

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: We should all help each other and foster peace and understanding of our global neighbours.
lender.occupational_info: I am working as a manager for a private investigation company, however I am also a writer and my heart is in peace and social justice work.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to give enterprising women a boost.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: people with the intitiative and energy and talent to do business are great leaders in this world, and we all need a boost at some time in life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach history and philosophy.

lender.name: vinny
lender.loan_because: i didnt want to give it away blind i wanted to choose where it went and this is the place to do that
lender.occupational_info: i am a student at a co edd boarding school i am in 8th grade who i am also jewish and had a bar mitsva on june 7th and 8th and i had people donate to kiva because i didnt want to give it away blind i wanted to choose where it went and this is the place to do that

lender.name: Diane and Harrison
lender.loan_because: The greatest gift is the gift of giving. I am fortunate to have had the opportunity to get an excellent education and live a comfortable life, so I feel honored to be in a position to help others.

lender.name: Cassie
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. The old saying "give a man a fish, feed him for a day, teach a man to fish, feed him for life" goes hand-in-hand with microloans. The more money you have, the more money you have to invest in my buisness, therefore the more money I have, which I can then invest somewhere else, and richer the world is.
lender.occupational_info: i work in a small coffee shop.

lender.name: Linda & David
lender.loan_because: The loan was a thoughtful Christmas gift from Paul and Linda. It is a wise use of resources far beyond more material goods.
lender.occupational_info: College text publishing manager and graphic artist and personal fitness trainer.

lender.name: Ewart Family
lender.loan_because: Our family wants to help others make a difference

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: It's good to share.
lender.occupational_info: Look for opportunities to do good things.

lender.name: Dwayne
lender.loan_because: I was raised on a small mixed farm in rural Prince Edward Island. Every fall during harvest relatives would pitch in and help on mine and our uncles farm. Now that I live in a city and hug a desk all day my hope is that this program will allow me the opportunity to pitch in and help out once again.

lender.name: Evan & Anna
lender.loan_because: We firmly believe that everyone should be able to have a cold drink after a hard day's work.
lender.occupational_info: Evan is a teacher and Anna is a water engineer.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: It feels great!
lender.occupational_info: I work for our community government teaching and doing accounting.

lender.name: Doreen
lender.loan_because: I care about people everywhere.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers. I am in school part-time studying to become a minister.

lender.name: Shawn & Janamarie
lender.loan_because: A great organizational behavior class taught by Warner Woodworth (http://marriottschool.byu.edu/emp/WPW) at BYU in the late 90s educated me about the power of things such as micro loans. My wife and I have been greatly blessed, and we hope our participation will make a meaningful difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I create computer programs, such as Internet applications. My wife manages our 3 boys at home and does accounting part time on the side.

lender.name: Sasha
lender.loan_because: I admire anyone working to better themselves and their families -and love that Kiva allows me to help someone change the course of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I develop stories to make into movies and television.

lender.name: Beatriz
lender.loan_because: I am a female entrepreneur running a small company which is now 15 years old. In all that time, I have had difficulty getting financing, and have had to fund my company myself. I have had a bit of success, and now want to lend a helping hand to other female entrepreneurs who just need a small financial push to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small advertising agency.

lender.name: Sabra
lender.loan_because: I have always been a little in awe of anyone who has the skill and courage to be an entrepreneur. Kiva allowed me to choose the businesses that would receive my support and I often find myself thinking of "my" people as if they were friends.
lender.occupational_info: I work part-time in a shelter for homeless families. My job is to supervise house routines and to offer information and support to residents.

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because:
I've heard a proverb that is attributed to Russia that goes something like this: "If you aren't a liberal when you are young, you have no heart. If you aren't a conservative when you're older, you have no brain." 
Being in my middle years I see this tranformational shift within me.

The proverb informs why I lend because slowly, over many years, I've realized that on occasion my generosity may have actually worked to entrench a problem rather than solve it. Since then, I've been much more focused on organizations that seek to empower individuals to *solve* problems and not merely band-aid them. This seems like one of these.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: ... I am "able". (Albeit modest in amount.) What is your reason for sharing?
lender.occupational_info: "Special Needs" Advocate

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel connected to people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a marketing consultant.

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the same opportunities to succeed.

lender.name: Elton & Frances
lender.loan_because: Working to benefit society maximizes individual happiness. Progressive cultures have worked to free humanity from the brutalities of mere survival and to reduce suffering, improve society, and develop global community. We seek to minimize the inequities of circumstance and ability, and we support a just distribution of natures resources and the fruits of human effort so that as many as possible can enjoy THE GOOD LIFE!
lender.occupational_info: We are avid motorcyclists and supporters of motorcyclists; We are also both Registered Nurses in hospitals.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because:
Jesus said to feed the poor and give shelter, so I am trying to do what my Lord commands.
Jesus also said: when you feed the poor and give them shelter, you are feeding and sheltering me.
lender.occupational_info: I have been installing and fixing electrical items

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: It is important (to me) to take personal responsibility for my involvement and contribution to the well-being of the world.

lender.name: Ed Bortoni
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: Most people are honest and want a chance to succeed in life. I hope my small loans make a big difference to people who are less fortunate than I.
lender.occupational_info: I sell party goods and chocolates on the internet.

lender.name: Cris, Ian and kids
lender.loan_because: We want to empower them to succeed, thereby changing their own lives and their childrens lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office for government, and my husband is an electrician

lender.name: Ruth M.
lender.loan_because: My family was able to help me along financially when I needed it, and I want to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I\'m a one-woman home repair and maintence service.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: It\'s needed.
lender.occupational_info: I a geographer who works with biking, transit, walking in cities.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: It\'s the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: I study animals and I teach at a University.

lender.name: margaret
lender.loan_because: Sometimes all it takes is a little help to move someone else forward in life.

lender.name: Matthew M Arsh
lender.loan_because: helping people is important
lender.occupational_info: student

lender.name: A.C.
lender.loan_because: everyone in one form or another, small or large, has the ability and means to help someone.

lender.name: Cissy
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs help one way or another to alleviate their suffering. Most people in impoverished and developing countries live in daily struggles that we, in developed countries, can't even imagine. This is a way that I could help them towards a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I make buildings and also design interiors worldwide.

lender.name: Clincomedic
lender.loan_because: it takes alot to ask for help and these folks ask for our help to make better lives for them and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Emergency medical care of sick and injured people.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I would like to help those who want to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: For 33 years I gave medical care to sick children

lender.name: Omar Suave
lender.loan_because: I like to help people
lender.occupational_info: I attend school every day except Sat. and Sun. I study a lot. I play soccer, basketball and lacrosse. I play the violin.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: I believe in humanity.
lender.occupational_info: I am an elementary school teacher. I teach French Immersion in the US.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: It's a way that I can help folks around the world, one bit at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a musician on Broadway in New York City.

lender.name: Gale
lender.loan_because: My daughter gave me a Kiva gift certificate, knowing that we share the belief that empowering individuals to make better lives for themselves is the best hope for ending poverty around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a partner in a firm that recruits leaders for mission-driven organizations, mostly nonprofits (e.g., educational institutions, advocacy organizations, providers of social services, and foundations).

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: To share the love of Christ!

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I wish to honor the citizens of San Lucas, El Paraiso, Honduras.

lender.name: matthieu and may
lender.loan_because: Great stories; great way of feeling useful while promoting self-sufficiency...love the faces across the globe. It helps us dream that we are just one big family!
lender.occupational_info: We try to bring a complete system of health to people, not only treating them by giving them meds, but also to give them clues on how to live a healthy lifestyle so that the occurrence of illnesses is greatly reduced.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I have been inspired by the Micro-Credit movement and attended a presentation that Kiva gave in Halifax.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the Nova Scotia Community College. As a volunteer I am very involved with aboriginal people with disabilities.

lender.name: Pranav
lender.loan_because: So one day my borrowers can lend

lender.name: Caitlin
lender.occupation: Pilates and Yoga teacher, Reiki practioner
lender.loan_because: I believe that what you put out into the universe will come back to you. Everyone deserves compassion and the right to change their life for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I make people move!

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: i think kiva is a great idea and I've really enjoyed travelling the 3rd world this is my chance to give something back that shows respect to the people in the 3rd world who want a better life.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: my son is currently a Peace Corp volunteer, working in Bolivia. He is striving to provide clean water to a tiny village in the Andes. The teachers I work with gave me the gift of helping KIVA in response to the work my son does. I am thrilled to be a part of this important work.
lender.occupational_info: I work in several classrooms at a rural elementary school, tutoring students, teaching math to kindergartners and to fifth graders, helping out wherever it is needed.

lender.name: laura
lender.loan_because: I think it\'s an easy, quick way to help people in their day by day work
lender.occupational_info: geographer of the future

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: People in countries like Canada have so much while others have so little. I feel honored to be able to offer assistance to these people and help make their lives a little easier. I especially like loaning to women, since I feel that by empowering women you empower their children and community. By doing this you help to make multi-generational changes leading to a better future for all. I find these loan recipients truely inspirational and I wish them all the best as they continue to grow their businesses and look after their families.
lender.occupational_info: Emergency healthcare provider

lender.name: Scratchy
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to assist micro business owners especially women in the middle east.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need, and want to help people with their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: Computer programmer: I write programs that create reports for a company in the health field.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It is a way to help people in their daily lives. Kiva makes the world a smaller more personal, human place.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I am self employed and grateful to have that opportunity. Others overseas have the same aspirations and I hope my modest loans can help them to have the same opportunity.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I like to help others that help themselves. These are hard working people that just need a little help. I'm glad that my money can make such a big difference when added with others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an elementary school teacher that doesn't make a lot but I'm lucky to have what I do so I try to share when I can.

lender.name: Carmita
lender.loan_because: I want to help out even in a small, simple way-- globally!

lender.name: Don & Donna
lender.loan_because: We very much believe that micro-lending dramatically improves the lives of people in poverty.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of making small loans to small businesses and entrepreneurs. I'm pleased that Kiva is so successful!

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: It is so easy to make a difference on Kiva. These are hard working people. They deserve an opportunity to live their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I love my organic vegetable garden to share with friends and neighbors.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.occupational_info: I help start small high schools in high-poverty urban areas across the U.S. See more at hfli.org

lender.name: Tiffany & Marty
lender.loan_because: We would like to contribute to a global community and help.
lender.occupational_info: (Tiffany) My work as a movement artist and filmmaker allows me to work with many different kinds of people. I am currently working on a documentary film about incarcerated women working in a vocational training program. \r\n(Marty) I am a small businessman and crafts person. I make functional pottery.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I believe in what KIVA is doing and in the people that are trying to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am working on figuring out what I am going to do with this next stage of life. But, I am pursuing consulting, yoga instructor training and remodeling.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Share the wealth
lender.occupational_info: Criminal defense

lender.name: John & Pat
lender.loan_because: It seems only right. It gives us great pleasure and it helps us stay connected to the amazing world around us.
lender.occupational_info: Retired but still learning and attempting to figure it all out . Trying to give something back.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: my good friend gave me a Christmas gift to share in hopes of helping others fulfill a dream.
lender.occupational_info: I am in health care working as an advanced registered nurse practitioner. I own my own practice and hope others can do the same.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: To empower those with the desire for a better life through achivement is an honor, a pleasure and a blessing.
lender.occupational_info: Our firm invests in business made of people creating opportunity and wealth.

lender.name: Shazia
lender.loan_because: I like to!
lender.occupational_info: I learn a lot about Earth's dynamics. That includes groundwater flows, forest structures, sand dunes, mountain formation, earthquakes, volcanic eruptions, air pollution, acid rain and any other types of habitats.

lender.name: Andrew Cardwell
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference to peoples life even if it's just in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I provide consulting skills in business information security.

lender.name: Romere
lender.loan_because: It's Give Back Time. I enjoy loaning to people who want to help themselves. Sometimes I wonder who's helping whom.

lender.name: L A Paul
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of small business to transform the lives of real people. I am especially excited to be able to empower women, who are the often the backbone of a community.
lender.occupational_info: I am a marketing professional -- that is, I help clients to clearly describe what business they are in and how that helps their customers.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I like the direct link Kiva provides to the entrepreneur

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of people to change their own lives.

lender.name: ParisSunset
lender.loan_because: It is wonderful helping other people in need. It's a great way to give back.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: It works and it changes peoples lives.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am in a profession that helps others to care for those who are in need.

lender.name: Kris & Jill
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life and therefore allow him or her to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed, therefore we feel it is our duty to help others who have a great vision for themselves and their family, but not the financial resources. Thank you for giving us this opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a teacher for 11 years, 10 of them teaching first grade. I have the wonderful opportunity of teaching children how to read. My husband is a computer technician at a very small yet very useful computer consulting company.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: of Jesus\' love.
lender.occupational_info: I create and maintain websites at an advertising/design agency.

lender.name: SnowQ2006
lender.loan_because: We are a group of friends in Minnesota who gather once a year to celebrate New Year\'s. This year we learned about Kiva and decided to pool our resources and make as many loans as possible over the next 12 months.
lender.occupational_info: We come from a very diverse range of backgrounds: business, non-profit, legal, medicine, etc.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I have traveled around the world and have met many wonderful hard working people. Plus, I have borrowed money in the past and it has helped me with my business.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I are retired but I coach a children's basketball team.

lender.name: Doug & Mary Ann
lender.loan_because: We believe those that have the initiative to take the financial risks to help themselves and their families, are the future for those communities.
lender.occupational_info: What we do in Canada: Disaster Mitigation Mould/Asbestos Remediation General contracting

lender.name: Darcy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are working hard to better their lives.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: after seeing the Frontline broadcast on Kiva, it was apparent to us that we could help.
lender.occupational_info: sales & marketing of peat moss, professional growing mixes and retail soils...

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference with the help from others

lender.name: Riley
lender.loan_because: Makes others happy. Makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: College Student

lender.name: Us
lender.loan_because: I believe in a first step to helping people, so they may help themselves, it is the best way to foster sustainable and permanent local economy. "You cannot build character and courage by taking away man's initiative and independence. You cannot help men permanently by doing for them what they could and should do fort themselves." Abraham Lincoln

lender.name: Ihor
lender.loan_because: it\'s a great idea

lender.name: Asha
lender.loan_because: I have believed in the power of microcredit lending since I first learned about it in a college economics class 12 years ago.
lender.occupational_info: Strategic planning for a socially-conscious women\'s clothing company

lender.name: Jim & Judy
lender.loan_because: Our lives are more complete when we help others.
lender.occupational_info: Jim is retired from purchasing materials for construction and Judy is retired from the medical field.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I know a small bit of help from someone can make a world of difference. It is my way of saying thank you to those who have helped me.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: Microloans are one of the most efficient tools to improve developement. Also I think it is a great idea that that you can choose who to lend to and to which kind of businesses the money goes to, this way you feel more personally involved.
lender.occupational_info: I work at Yahoo! to improve the relevance of web search results and advertisements

lender.name: Nadia
lender.loan_because: Although $25 might not change my life; it can change someone else\'s!
lender.occupational_info: Respiratory therapists cover all areas of a hospital, but specialize in illness of the lungs and/or heart.\r\nAnd Mom\'s just do it ALL! :)

lender.name: Megan & Jahan
lender.loan_because: Helping others is our duty.

lender.name: Tom, Lori, Evanne and Meredithe
lender.loan_because: Proverbs 14:31, James 1:27

lender.name: Monir Ahmed
lender.loan_because: I like to see hard working and disciplined people make it on their own and help rid the world of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am the chief business and finance officer for a major research university in the United States.

lender.name: Antonia
lender.loan_because: "Hope is a waking dream." - Aristotle

lender.name: Bateman Family
lender.loan_because: it seems like the least I can possibly do.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: "I don't know. My my code of morals, perhaps." "Your code of morals. What code, if I may ask?" "Comprehension."
lender.occupational_info: Law

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: Every person deserves an opportunity to improve them self.
lender.occupational_info: I help people in a time of crisis, and protect the public.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work in accounting.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: Somehow makes me feel less guilty spending $120/month on Comcast TV/Internet...
lender.occupational_info: Government job. Extremely slow!

lender.name: Bryan
lender.occupational_info: Woodworking

lender.name: Howard & Debbie
lender.loan_because: it's easy to do. Being self employed, I know how hard it can be to get funds at times.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: My family's business has benefited from business financing.
lender.occupational_info: Growing vegetable transplants under glass greenhouses

lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting entrepreneurs, especially women who work hard to support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I help charitable organizations raise money effectively so they can make the world a better place

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I worked as a small development volunteer in Mauritania, West Africa from 1998 - 2000 and know first hand what a small business loan can mean to parents who have virtually nothing but the desire to work hard to feed their family. I know that I\'m blessed to have opportunities in my life and I find great satisfaction helping others who are less fortunate reach their personal goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that designs, manufactures, imports, and sells costume jewelry.

lender.name: Devans00
lender.loan_because: I'm in a position to help other people so I try to spread around as much money to those in need as I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work on organizing internet applications development.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: Redistribution of wealth to people who don't have it rights some injustice and brings hope.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital serving patients and families suffering with severe medical problems. Patients in our unit have diagnoses such as kidney failure, congestive heart failure, and respiratory failure. I am very grateful to do the work that I do. It is meaningful, social, and provides for my needs.

lender.name: Terza
lender.loan_because: As each person grows, so do we all.
lender.occupational_info: Inspiring others to become successful, lead happy lives, and teach others to do the same.

lender.name: Dionne
lender.loan_because: I want to make some small difference in this world.

lender.name: anissa
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I program websites.

lender.name: Justine & Aaron
lender.loan_because: We can and therefore should.
lender.occupational_info: Helping businesses develop their employees in a meaningful way.

lender.name: Chris and Vee
lender.occupational_info: Chris develops computer software and satellite tracking systems, particularly in the field of marine safety.\r\n\r\nVera is a student of NGO Management at Charles University in Prague, and works at Caritas, co-ordinating Capacity Building projects.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I have done a lot of traveling to poorer countries and have felt helpless to really aide the wonderful people I have met in any meaningful way. I feel that loaning through Kiva allows the people to really change their lives, and I am glad to be of any help. Such a little thing, but the difference it makes is great.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I own a busy little Greek restaurant. If you've ever seen the movie "My Big Fat Greek Wedding" you've opened a window into our lives. My husband really works hard to build a good life for us, and we have been very lucky.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I think every dollar you spend is a vote for what you want to perpetuate in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I study how people understand sentences.

lender.name: Thea
lender.occupation: retired from Univ of Calif, Santa Barbara

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Introduced to kiva via a gift certificate.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit that does work somewhat like kiva\'s within the United States.

lender.name: Sharron
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help people help themselves on their own terms, and then to roll the investment over and help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I resell small antiques and fine art strictly on the internet from my websites. Retail, not auction.

lender.name: Divine Favour
lender.loan_because: Divine Favour Ministries is committed to mission, outreach and winning souls to Christ. We loan to expand our arms of love internationally and to assist our sisters and brothers in becoming self-sufficient
lender.occupational_info: We are a Bible based ministry focused on the true mission of Christ. Go ye into all the world and preach the Gospel. We walk in Divine Favour and believe others can receive the "Favour" of God when they submit their lives to God's word and His will

lender.name: Rick and Denise
lender.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves and be a positive contributor to their community.
lender.occupational_info: We sell and install Audio Visual presentation equipment to the commerical market...home theater, if you will, for business market.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: Money doesn't do much in a bank! =)

lender.name: mariano
lender.loan_because: my compadre mike gave me a gift certificate for christmas

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Cary
lender.loan_because: Being able to help someone make a better life for themselves is a great thing.
lender.occupational_info: Data analyst

lender.name: Giovanna
lender.loan_because: I have personally seen how small loans actually do change lives, for the better!

lender.name: wolfville community
lender.loan_because: Our small group of friends want to help those people who can not get a seat at the table.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of friends who live in Wolfville NS, Canada. We have been friends for over 25 years, rasied our children together and want to help others with our donations.

lender.name: Olivia
lender.loan_because: we have the means to help another individual and show them the same compassion that we would like to be shown if we were in their position.
lender.occupational_info: Advise college students with general questions and help them to reach their goal of receiving a BA/degree.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: In my own small way, by lending, I feel as if I am helping someone that wants to make a difference in their own life.
lender.occupational_info: In my world, I loan money to qualified recipients in the mortgage industry.

lender.name: scott
lender.loan_because: I wish for others, the opportunities and benefits that can arise from simple trust.
lender.occupational_info: We recycle specific types of lumber from old structures, and remanufacture them into products such as flooring & paneling.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I believe that these loans are just the kind of jump starts needed to help people realise their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student in Human Development researching education and mental health in refugee children.

lender.name: Izabelle
lender.loan_because: I believe the world as a whole benefits from a global economy where resources are fairly and generously shared.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.occupational_info: I manage the computer system that houses all the personal information for my company.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate to have all my needs met and would like, in some small way, to help others who have had fewer opportunities than I. It is a nice way to complement my charitable giving to NGOs that address humanitarian issues.
lender.occupational_info: I spent my career working for the Government of Canada in Ottawa.

lender.name: The Yorks
lender.loan_because: We want to help someone make their life better through their own hard work and perseverance (and a little help from their friends).

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I want to share my blessings to those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a print advertising sales person. My company prints and mails advertising mail.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I wish the best for everyone. I hope I can make a difference before I leave the world.

lender.name: Tyesha and Chad
lender.occupation: User Experience Architect and Massage Therapist

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: ...I hope!

lender.name: Hal
lender.loan_because: I Can.
lender.occupational_info: I learn and teach, and share the world with student who wish to do the same.

lender.name: Alexia
lender.loan_because: Im cool like that.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and learn.

lender.name: Frank D
lender.occupation: Owner/Dir. Sales & Marketing of a software company
lender.occupational_info: I started a company that developed a computer program that helps run a dentists office.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: He first loved us. 1 John 4:19.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently attending law school.

lender.name: Marsha
lender.loan_because: My nephew introduced me to Kiva. I believe that small loans from private lenders are the key to helping people realize their goals and improve their standard of living.
lender.occupational_info: I provide psychotherapy to persons who have experienced trauma, want to improve their relationships, are depressed, etc. I have worked with many immigrants and refugees who are living in Minneapolis, MN

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a break

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.occupational_info: I am a pastor of a church.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I believe in this type of grassroots loaning. And the resources I have can help someone else better their situation. Its a great program!
lender.occupational_info: I create custom software applications to help organizations run their businesses better.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: these entrepreneurs need the monies a lot more than I do.

lender.name: marty
lender.loan_because: I want to help out and am in the fortunate position to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I teach elementary school to boys and girls between 10 and 11 years old (5th grade). In the picture, I am on the right and that is my older brother with me.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: \"I resolved to stop accumulating and begin the infinitely more serious and difficult task of wise distribution.\"\r\n-Andrew Carnegie
lender.occupational_info: I work on software development projects to help determine the needs of the project and how technology can support those needs. I communicate ideas between computer specialists and business managers, document project requirements, and help manage projects to completion.

lender.name: Tanuja
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people and hopefully help change the world for the better. I love the idea that this is not just an individual but a community effort as well.

lender.name: C. Andrew
lender.loan_because: I\'m an econ student, and it\'s a damn good idea.
lender.occupational_info: I\'m currently attending a small liberal arts college in the United States - majoring in Computer Science and Economics. I will be studying abroad in Asia next year.

lender.name: Eielson
lender.loan_because: Being comfortable is not always a comfort , of all the things we do with our lives helping a fellow human is the most important.
lender.occupational_info: Medical

lender.name: Hakan
lender.loan_because: It makes more sense than buying beer or cigarettes.
lender.occupational_info: I sit at a computer all day, slowly withering away.

lender.name: Roxanna
lender.occupational_info: I grow all natural vegetables.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: this is better than an iPod

lender.name: Ivan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Building businesses, dealing with people, making things better.

lender.name: Lloyd
lender.loan_because: It is pleasing to see the benefits to the borrower of funds that I can afford.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired civil engineering faculty member. The picture is at a zoo, where I lead teams of undergraduates prepare preliminary exhibit designs, including this 1/3-scale railroad track and station.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: It is a privilege to have an active part to play in your life.
lender.occupational_info: I have interested several people in kiva and our church group gives a certificate as a gift to speakers at our women's meetings.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I built my business myself. I want to help others do the same thing.
lender.occupational_info: I design houses and communities for people.

lender.name: JohnK
lender.loan_because: This concept intrigues me on multiple levels.
lender.occupational_info: I make computers talk to each other across the earth.

lender.name: A Family
lender.loan_because: Our family wanted to use the money we would have spent on Christmas gifts to help others to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We are an extended family of 15 people living in Southern California. We range in ages from 8 to 80 years of age.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I teach art to students in Camden, New Jersey who attend a school started by a ministry called Urban Promise. We rely on private funding to provide a quality education for students in the Camden area.

lender.name: Baker Middle School
lender.loan_because: We wish to make a difference, however small, in the lives of needy people.
lender.occupational_info: These loans are a combined effort between community, staff, and the 290 students of an Oregon, USA middle school.

lender.name: Mary Anne
lender.occupation: retired,treasurer of Unity of Livonia church
lender.loan_because: it's a personal way to give new opportunity, and it is renewable.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer in the bookstore at my church, and help promote the music events there.

lender.name: Judi
lender.loan_because: I take immense pleasure in enabling other people, especially people in farming, and especially women who work as hard as I do, and especially olderwomen
lender.occupational_info: Cut, Rake, Bale & sell Hay.\r\nI struggle with weather, equipment, lack of help at times, and my aging body and mind

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: It works; and because someone helped me, too.
lender.occupational_info: I help people create and grow their nonprofits.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: it's better than giving as the money can be loaned again and again...

lender.name: Shivani
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world with what I have.

lender.name: ladybug farm
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do... life is an echo..what we give out comes back.
lender.occupational_info: I design jewely for a living.http://www.word4worddesign.etsy.com I love using quotes/words in my jewelry...it inspires others

lender.name: Thea
lender.occupation: retired from the Univ of Calif, Santa Barbara

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: All the money I lend goes to the target and they are accountable for using it efficiently.
lender.occupational_info: Consulting

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: ever since a few months ago, I\'ve been really excited about microlending. I think it\'s an incredible thing. And when I read about Kiva, and then again heard about it on NPR, I decided that I just had to take part.
lender.occupational_info: Um, I'm a student, I go to class, I read my books, I study, I take tests, I sit through lectures, and do labs, I grumble and groan and then get a report card every few months.

lender.name: Morgan
lender.loan_because: every little bit helps.

lender.name: Alin
lender.loan_because: My seven years old daugther SOLENE birthday. By lending and helping people who need it the most, I believe to bring her more blessing. By the time she grows up, hopefully, she will have already helped hundreds of people. Coming myself from Togo, I know how much we are in need of such actions. Little changes can make a huge difference. This is why I support KIVA.org in its effort to \"make this world a better place\".

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people to take care of their families and build the financial ability to positively effects others in their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct research on nutrition and its effects during pregnancy on the health of the mother and fetus. I currently work with horses to do this work.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: It is hard to start a business in the USA I can't imagine how hard it must be to start one in a third world country
lender.occupational_info: I sell ice cream and other food items out of a concession trailor

lender.name: Aany & Arlan
lender.loan_because: it's fun, we respect the bravery of the people who start their own businesses, and we secretly want to have our own restaurant someday.
lender.occupational_info: At her job, Aany helps companies provide pensions to their employees. Arlan helps people represent their businesses on the web. For fun, we make music and food, and go fishing.

lender.name: Savour
lender.loan_because: it is time that every business - big and small - lend a helping hand without it always being about \"return on investment\". Success breeds success.
lender.occupational_info: Savour is a Canadian promotion and marketing company that develops ideas and orchestrates campaigns designed to grow businesses. We consult, create and coordinate results-oriented initiatives for commercial enterprises including retail and multi-media.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be someone who can.

lender.name: Captaindougd
lender.loan_because: I am grateful and want to share my good fortune with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a film maker.

lender.name: Laine
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Werty
lender.loan_because: I started my own business about 2 years ago and it has been a huge positive change for me. I am interested in helping others meet their goals of starting their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I make websites and funnel traffic through them.

lender.name: Number
lender.loan_because: Sensible cooperation benefits everyone.
lender.occupational_info: Number administers computer networks and writes Windows scripts. In his spare time he sings and is learning to play the piano.

lender.name: Allen
lender.loan_because: My Uncle always said, \"Money is like fertilizer, it doesn\'t do any good unless you spread it around.\"
lender.occupational_info: Small business lender

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: if you change one life for the better, you change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help municipalities and not for profits provide parks for people through state grants. I also supervise an environmental education program at Allegany State Park, NY.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: There, but for the grace of God, go I!

lender.name: D & D
lender.loan_because: It helps us to feel better if someone\'s life is more fulfilled because of some little thing that we have done.
lender.occupational_info: We are priviledged to have a small factory in Canada with several employees.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: To better the economy by helping create commerce for those who otherwise may not have the opportunity.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: we must especially help those who are eager to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I help organizations come closer to realizing their maximum potential, by developing the leadership skills of every employee. Entrepreneurs like you are leaders. If I can help you succeed, I know you will help others in your country to succeed like you did.

lender.name: Shayn
lender.loan_because: It gives me a good feeling knowing that I am helping someone. Also, after travelling in some very poor places, I have seen how desperately many people need financial support to help create a reliable income for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I babysit, cut grass and do odd jobs around the neighbourhood. Also, sometimes in summer I earn money working for my dad's company.

lender.name: Emily Fulton
lender.loan_because: I can and therefore I should.

lender.name: Jackie and Jimmy
lender.loan_because: Because I want to help others less fortunate help themselves grow financially and personally

lender.name: Alyssa
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and I want to make a difference.
